com.lucidworks.apollo.component

Class CrudComponent<E extends com.lucidworks.apollo.common.objects.Entity>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lucidworks.apollo.component.CrudComponent<E>

  • public class CrudComponent<E extends com.lucidworks.apollo.common.objects.Entity>
extends java.lang.Object
    Encapsulate our REST CRUD semantics in a composeable way. API Resources that wish to provide our standard CRUD behavior should use this class. All of the methods are called with functions that perform the "raw" CRUD operations on the underlying ItemStore-s (or other management classes). This class allows us to standardize the behavior before and after these methods are called. This classes uses Suppliers for everything so it can be constructed in our API resource constructors before some of the objects are available. For example, UriInfo is not available at construction time, but is during request time when these methods are called.

      • getAllEntities

        public final java.util.List<E> getAllEntities(CrudComponent.CrudSupplier<java.util.List<E>> getAllEntitiesFunction,
                                              java.util.function.Function<E,com.lucidworks.apollo.names.FusionResource> resourceFunction)
                                       throws com.lucidworks.apollo.common.error.RESTError
        Return a list of entities of type "E" which has been properly filtered Filters applied:
      • Remove entities which the current user is not authorized to view
      • If "context" query param is provided, only return entities which are part of that context
Parameters:
getAllEntitiesFunction - A supplier which returns all entities of a type "E"
resourceFunction - A function which derives a FusionResource from an entity of type "E"
Throws:
com.lucidworks.apollo.common.error.RESTError
